titleStmt.title: An order for government of housholds, vvarranted by Gods word, and commanded by the eternall God, and therefore ought not to be neglected nor impugned, of any that in truth and sincerity seeke to serve the Lord, but with all care and diligence ought to be put in execution, of all those that seeke the safety of the soules committed to them, and the discharge of their owne conscience.
titleStmt.author: M. I.

titleStmt.title: An order for government of housholds, vvarranted by Gods word, and commanded by the eternall God, and therefore ought not to be neglected nor impugned, of any that in truth and sincerity seeke to serve the Lord, but with all care and diligence ought to be put in execution, of all those that seeke the safety of the soules committed to them, and the discharge of their owne conscience.
titleStmt.author: M. I.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Mary Brusey, and are to be sold by Iohn Wright Iunior, in the little Old Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
